intro: Palicourea nigricans, commonly known as blackstem palicourea, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its leaves are usually elliptical, with a dark green upper surface and a lighter underside, and it produces small, clustered inflorescences. Palicourea nigricans is often found in humid, shaded environments within the understorey of tropical forests.
